EmailTemplate.subject: Labor Day Fulfillment Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly: September 2, 2021 This is a reminder that Monday, September 6th, 2021 is Labor Day—a Government and NCR Holiday observed by NCR and our logistics provider; it is not considered a business day. Orders with a Service Level of Next Business Day (NBD) will be fulfilled as shown below. Orders with a Service Level of Next Calendar Day (NCD) will not be affected by the holiday. They will be shipped the same day as ordered and delivered the following dy. Next Flight Out (NFO) service will also be available every day, including Monday September the 6th. Please remember, 6:00PM Eastern Time is the cut off time.
